attributes.action: Legislate to protect  Digital Terrestrial Television from encroachment by subscription services.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sky have recently announced that they intend to remove Sky 3, Sky News and Sky Sports News from Freeview and replace them with a new terrestrial service that is completely incompatible with existing Digital Terrestrial Television services.

The majority of the available Terrestrial television spectrum, both before and after the digital 'switchover' should be ring-fenced for free-to-air services only. Legislation should ensure that less than 1/3 (33%) of any available Terrestrial Television bandwidth is available to subscription TV services.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
